judges: Before Jones, Ea&en, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy and Babbieei, JJ.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
The petition for allowance of appeal having been improvidently granted, the above captioned appeal is dismissed.
Mr. Chief Justice Bell took no part in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Michael M. Palmisano, District Attorney, for Commonwealth, appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Commonwealth v. Lindsey, Appellant.
Argued September 28, 1971.
Before Jones, Ea&en, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy and Babbieei, JJ.
Burton L. Fish, for appellant.
Michael M. Palmisano, District Attorney, for Commonwealth, appellee.
December 29, 1971:
